name: Swords, Shields 'n' Dice
description: This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. With the theme being "Roll of the Dice", I was full of ideas. The one I went for was a dice builder roguelike. I've gotten the dice builder part down, but without a lot of randomness, it's not really a roguelike. But I'm steadily moving towards my vision.
